name: Dream Garden
description:
Let this little idle game run in the background while you work!

Tend to your plants and they will reward you with hearts. Use your hearts to buy more seeds and unlock more plants while you listen to chill lo-fi beats. Grow plants to adulthood and complete your collection! Your plants can never die so you don't have to worry about the stress of real plants. :)

To plant a seed, begin by clicking the plant pot - most of all, have fun!

Follow me on Twitter for more game shenanigans.
